place.name: BROXHOLME
place.gazetteerText: BROXHOLME, a parish in the district and county of Lincoln, adjacent to the Great Northern railway, 1¾ mile N of Saxelby station, and 6 NW of Lincoln. Post Town, Saxelby, under Lincoln. Acres, 1,298. Real property, £2,593. Pop., 125. Houses, 19. The living is a rectory in the diocese of Lincoln. Value, £273.* Patron, J. Robinson, Esq. The church is ancient. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
